resources.string: Please use the options below to change the mode.\n Evaluation is the mode with best performance.\n Default is the \"default\" mode.

Update 1.1:[Experimental] You can enable the force set service from the above option menu which will "try" to change the mode to the user selected mode from below options, whenever it is changed by the system or when the system restarts. 

 Update 2.0[Experimental]
~Enter Profiler~ 
You can now have different modes based on the app.
